title: Getting to Start the Zaralek Caverns Quest: Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Complete or skip the "Forbidden Reach" campaign on each character.
steps.content: Complete or skip the "Forbidden Reach" campaign on each character. Doing so will prompt your character to start the 10.1 campaign, which opens up Zaralek Caverns. However, once one of your characters completes "Scar of Earth and Fire," the zone will open to all the characters on your account. [1] X Research source To open World Quests and the Loamm Niffen, you need to progress through chapter 1 of the 10.1 campaign called "Breaking Ground."

steps.title: New reputation and rewards.
steps.content: New reputation and rewards. You can also open a quest by reaching Renown Rank 20 with the Loamm Niffen, which you'll need if you're attempting to complete the Zaralek Cavern meta-achievement, Que Zara(lek), Zara(lek).

steps.title: Collect Flightstones.
steps.content: Collect Flightstones. These will allow you to upgrade your Dragonflight Season 2 gear!

steps.title: Get lots of collectibles.
steps.content: Get lots of collectibles. By exploring the map, completing quests, or raising your rep ranking with the Loamm Niffen, you can get pets, mounts, toys, transmogs, and achievements!
